title: Yes, that is really Deepika Padukone in these 10 unseen photos - | Photo1 | India Today |
text:
Yes, that is really Deepika Padukone in these 10 unseen photos Yes, that is really Deepika Padukone in these 10 unseen photos x
In 2017, you don't expect to see Deepika Padukone not perfectly turned-out, be it during the promotions of a film or sashaying down the ramp. However, it wasn't always this way. Take a look at 10 rare photos of Deepika Padukone from her modelling days. They might help you get over the mandatory Monday-grumpiness.
